content.rendered: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]News and events deals with covering any important and update information that best serve the interest of National Data Management Centre/EPHI. Communications, public relations and covering events are the main duties of the unit. It also updates the whole National Data Management Centre (NDMC) with up to date health related information. In addition, the activity of writing press release, news, stories and other contents that best describe the work and events of NDMC are the responsibilities of News and Events.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
